pageContext.claim: “'Ax falls quickly at BuzzFeed and Huffpost!' Headline, New York Post. Fake News and bad journalism have caused a big downturn. Sadly, many others will follow. The people want the Truth!”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence that "fake news" and "bad journalism" led to reductions in staff at BuzzFeed and Huffington Post. The owners said the cuts were necessary because of a challenging environment for digital media, especially as Facebook and Google have upended the ad business.
